author: Paolo Santalucia
title: 103-year-old credits 'courage' and 'faith' for recovery...
description: 103-year-old credits 'courage' and 'faith' for recovery... (Third column, 13th story, link ) Related stories: Cubans cast aside virus fears to search for scarcer food... 150 members of the Saudi royal family sick... One hundred Italian doctors have died... Du…
content:
ROME (AP) To recover from the coronavirus, as she did, Ada Zanusso recommends courage and faith, the same qualities that have served her well in her nearly 104 years.
